This Cookie Policy explains how MEMOPYK EURL ("we," "us," "our") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website memopyk.com. By continuing to browse our site, you consent to our use of cookies as described below.

Cookies are small text files placed on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. They help the site remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size) over a period of time.

Strictly Necessary Cookies
Essential for the website to function properly (e.g., session cookies, security tokens).

Performance & Analytics Cookies
Collect anonymous information about how visitors use our site (e.g., pages visited, error messages) via Google Analytics.

Functional Cookies
Remember your choices to improve your experience (e.g., language preference, video player settings).

Targeting & Advertising Cookies
Track your browsing habits to deliver relevant ads on our site or third-party sites. We do not currently employ such cookies ourselves.
Name | Provider | Purpose | Expiry
_session_id | memopyk.com | Keeps you logged in | Session
_gid, _ga | google.com | Google Analytics user/session tracking | 1–2 years
cookielawinfo | memopyk.com | Stores your cookie consent preferences | 1 year
We embed content (e.g., videos) and analytics tools (Google Analytics). Those third parties may set their own cookies.
Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies. You can learn how to manage cookies in your browser:
Chrome: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647
Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences
Safari: https://support.apple.com/guide/safari/manage-cookies-and-website-data-sfri11471/mac
Edge: https://support.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/delete-cookies-in-microsoft-edge
If you disable strictly necessary cookies, parts of our site may not function. Disabling performance cookies will prevent us from understanding how the site is used and improving it.
We may update this policy as our site evolves or to reflect changes in applicable law. We will post any changes here with a revised date.
For questions about our Cookie Policy, email us at info@memopyk.com
